content: At the end of the second quarter of 2022, our total U.S. headcount was 326 or 9% of the company's total headcount and remain on the same level compared to the first quarter 2022, and down 11% in the year ago quarter. On a non-GAAP basis, our gross profit was $29.1 million or 37.7%, up from $27 million or 37.8% in the first quarter of 2022, and up from $19.9 million or 41.8% in the year ago quarter. Non-GAAP EBITDA during the second quarter that excluded stock-based compensation, depreciation and amortization, expenses related to geographic reorganization, transaction and other related costs were $13.3 million or 17.2% of revenue, up from $11.4 million or 15.9% in the first quarter of 2022 and up from $9.7 million or 20.4% in the year ago quarter. On a non-GAAP basis, in the second quarter, our non-GAAP net income was $8.2 million or $0.12 per share based on 70 million diluted shares compared to the first quarter of 2022 non-GAAP net income of $6.9 million or $0.10 per diluted share based on 70 million diluted shares and $6.1 million or $0.10 per diluted share based on 61 million diluted shares in the year ago quarter.
